meanings.definition: To introduce an acetyl group into a compound.
meanings.sent1: She acetylates the molecule to change its properties.
meanings.sent2: The scientist acetylates the substance to study its effects.
meanings.sent3: The chef acetylates the recipe with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: His creativity acetylates the project with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artist acetylates the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with acetic acid or an acetyl derivative.
meanings.sent1: They acetylate the fabric to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist acetylates the medication for better absorption.
meanings.sent3: The gardener acetylates the soil to improve plant growth.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acetylates the atmosphere with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The chef acetylates the dish with a tangy flavor.
